title: Super nice 1 bed with a studio price tag
posting_body: Wonderful 1 bed with a studio price tag.
South facing unit with lots of sunlight, great full spacious white kitchen, and AC included!
Located near South End shopping, restaurants, transportation...everything!

Green/Orange/Silver Line T stops, MBTA bus, BU Shuttle Bus, Mass Avenue, Symphony Hall, Northeastern University (NEU), New England Conservatory of Music, Berklee College of Music, Massachusetts College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences (MCPHS), Museum of Fine Art, Emerson College, South End area, Back Bay area, Fenway Park, Prudential Center, Whole Foods Market, and everything Boston has to offer.
WE ACCEPT VISA MASTERCARD & AMERICAN EXPRESS
